channel.title: Pages on Anthony Wong
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Anthony Wong

item.title: About
item.description: My name is professor Anthony Wong. I am a graduate student (and also a PhD student). My field of study is computational engineering and systems science. I am a guest lecturer on the Department of Industrial Engineering and has several graduate/post doctoral courses on some topics. So please allow me to add some useful information. If you’re thinking about joining a project and have some very useful information or questions you can contact me by email (anthony.
